text: basic example shows solve common problem: special using README.Rmd instead just README.md? can include R chunks like :
code: library(crcc) ## basic example code summary(cars) #>      speed           dist        #>  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00   #>  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00   #>  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00   #>  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98   #>  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00   #>  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00

what: Bioclimatic variables downscaled and calibrated CMIP6 climate data for projected future climates of continental Costa Rica (2021 - 2040) — cr_inm_cm4_8_ssp126_2021_2040
title: Bioclimatic variables downscaled and calibrated CMIP6 climate data for projected future climates of continental Costa Rica (2021 - 2040) — cr_inm_cm4_8_ssp126_2021_2040
text: Includes 3 GCMs (General Circulation Models), INM_CM4_8, MPI-ESM1-2-HR UKESM1-0-LL, four SSPs (Shared Socioeconomic Pathways), ssp126, ssp245, ssp370 ssp585. Resolution 0.5 minutes degree (~1km).
